FuncDef: This command overrides the LLGR stale-time advertised by a peer (in its LLGR capability) with a locally-configured value. When configured in the long-lived configuration context,helper-override-stale-timeapplies to all AFI/SAFI in the advertised LLGR capability except for any AFI/SAFI with a family-specific override. A family-specific override is configured with thehelper-override-stale-timecommand in a family context.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the locally imposed LLGR stale time in seconds. Values-0 to 16777215.
